fallback.browser: You are leaving the StudOn App
fallback.synchronization_subtitle: Please wait a few seconds while we synchronize your StudOn-account.

onboarding.title1: With the help of this app you can:
onboarding.function1: access your StudOn courses on your smartphone.
onboarding.concept1: This app is a customized version if the ILIAS Pegasus App.
onboarding.concept2: It connects to the StudOn E-Larning Platform of the Friedrich-Alexander-Universität Erlangen-Nürnberg.
